about_the_game:
This is a VR-Only game, using OpenXR

Argh Pirates!! The brits are attacking your pirate cove! Get ready to fight them, using towers you acquire from various mini games. Place them on the board and slam the bell to start the wave. The towers will automatically target the British boats when they pass by.

Types of towers:
Rifleman Tower - Fast Projectiles with low damage
Bomber Tower - Slow but high damage
Monkey Catapult - Attaches itself to a enemy boat and deals damage over time
Harpoon Tower - Slows down the enemies

The towers can be acquired by interacting with the arcade machines.
Claw Machine
Whack-a-moneky: Essentially Whack-a-mole, but with a monkey's hand instead. Hit that monkey a certain amount of time to be rewarded a tower
Shoot a bottle: Inside the cabinet is a shooting range, where you have to use a pistol and shoot a certain amount of bottles to be rewarded a tower.

Controls:

Adjust height:
Hold either the right laser point or right controller and aim at the box icon with text “Height up” or “Height down”.
This will adjust the player's height in the VR build.

Turn off laser in game:
X Button / Primary button on the Left VR motion controller.

Teleportation:
Hold the right VR motion controller primary button / A to show the teleportation circle “gizmo”. While holding A on the right motion controller press X / Primary button on the left motion controller to confirm and teleport to the location that the player is aiming at.
Blue circle gizmo - Can teleport
White circle gizmo - Cannot teleport

Rotate view:
Right VR controller joystick

Regular movement:
Left VR controller joystick

Interaction/grab:
Grip button on each Vr controller. Allows two items to be picked up, one on each hand.

Reset player position:
Left Joystick click

name: Treasure Defence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Khronos, Oculus, Valve Index and Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 4600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Khronos, Oculus, Valve Index and Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Treasure Defence is an award winning VR game that innovates on the classic tower defence genre. Play arcades, win towers and fight The Royal British Navy. Plunder gold from destroyed ships and fortify your pirate cove.
